fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-During a Full Moon, attack a player. You will bleed (Post 214, Animal Breeder) two of their visitors.
-During a New Moon, attack a player, and bleed all those that the attacked player targetted. If your target did not target anybody or self targetted, you will instead bleed one of their visitors.

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enhancement:
fields.value:
Sharp Claws
Your Attack is upgraded to Powerful, and you will bleed all of their visitors.
